snippet: The midterm legislative elections are seen as crucial to President Benigno S. Aquino III’s consolidation of power in his final term.
abstract: Election results in Philippines show political allies of Pres Benigno S Aquino poised to take control of Senate, event that would strengthen his hold on power and allow him to advance his anti-corruption and economic-growth program.
lead_paragraph: The midterm legislative elections are seen as crucial to President Benigno S. Aquino III’s consolidation of power in his final term.

headline.seo: Aquino Allies Lead in Philippine Voting
headline.main: Aquino Allies Take Lead in Election in Philippines
headline.print_headline: Aquino Allies Take Lead In Elections In Philippines
